name: timetrack
title: Time Tracker
description: Simple time tracking for clients and projects
author: aarona

commands.name: track
commands.title: Track Time
commands.description: Start or switch time tracking for a client/project

commands.name: status
commands.title: Time Tracking Status
commands.description: View current tracking status and today's summary

commands.name: manage-entries
commands.title: Manage Time Entries
commands.description: View, add, edit, or delete time entries

commands.name: summary
commands.title: Time Summary
commands.description: Dashboard with weekly client hours and distribution chart

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
